title: Sun Glitter
medium: watercolor on paper enlarged with horizontal. strips mounted on board
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Charles E. Burchfield [1893-1967], West Seneca, NY; Frank K. M. Rehn, Inc., New York, NY, until June 1946; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, June 1946 [1]; their gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, June 1946.

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Beal purchased the watercolor for $1000 from the Rehn Gallery in June 1946 (see curatorial file for her original note, receipt of payment for the purchase, dated June 12, 1946, and copies of correspondence with the gallery from Archives of American Art.) See also "The Beal Collection of American Art," Carnegie Museum of Art, 1994, pages 79-80.

creator.death_place: West Seneca (Erie county, New York state, United States)
